title: Ambient - Volume 2
description: The second collection of ambient backgrounds featuring orchestral strings, soft synthesizers, dark drones and minimal electronics.
longDescription:
Preview the collection on:﻿

  • Youtube


"Ambient - Volume 2" is a collection of ambient backgrounds featuring orchestral strings, soft synthesizers, dark drones and minimal electronics.

Suitable for any futuristic game, RPG, adventure or arcade, every music theme comes with multiple loops and shorter edits.


  • Abstract Ambient Percussions: Full length (02:14), 3 Short edits, 6 Loops
  • Sine Space: Full length (02:02), 2 Short edits, 7 Loops
  • Evocative Cinematic: Full length (02:04), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Winter Ambient: Full length (02:49), 2 Short edits, 7 Loops
  • Horror Background Drone: Full length (01:47), 3 Loops
  • Soft Light: Full length (03:02), 2 Short edits, 4 Loops
  • Peaceful Dreamtime: Full length (02:24), 1 Short edit, 4 Loops
  • Minimal Electronic Particles: Full length (02:32), 1 Short edit, 7 Loops
  • Oceans: Full length (01:51), 2 Short edits, 3 Loops
  • Bright Skies: Full length (01:53), 1 Short edit, 12 Loops


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Maybe you might be interested at "Ambient - Volume 1"


Hi, I'm Luca Tomassini a composer and "1st generation gamer", with more than 20 years of expertise in music production. I sincerely hope my music will help you to elevate your creation!

frequentlyaskedmusic.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 Full length
  •  16 Short edits
  •  58 Loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 84

Number of Audio Cues: 84

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 80:16

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
